name: snowball survival
description:
thanks for playing my game. I thought I'd make a quick small game for the winter.

and If you find any bugs, please leave comment telling me where and why.

if you enjoy my game, then feel free to check out my itch page for more.

HOW TO PLAY:

to defend your tent from the invaders, first you'll need a defence.

Press E to open up your build menu and either build a turret or wall.

Building costs resources that increase over time, to gain more resources you'll

have to kill the enemies that spawn around your camp.

Enemies will also increase over time, so you'll need to make a fortress if

you want to survive.

Good luck
